con:request.name: Get list of products by page and limit

con:configuration.scriptText: import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def accesstoken=holder.data.access_token log.info accesstoken def complete_acesstoken="bearer "+accesstoken log.info complete_acesstoken context.testCase.testSuite.setPropertyValue("AcessToken",complete_acesstoken) assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["#status#"] == ["HTTP/1.1 200 OK"]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def customerId=holder.data[5].customer_id log.info customerId.toString() context.testCase.testSuite.project.setPropertyValue("CustomerId",customerId.toString())

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def accesstoken=holder.data.access_token log.info accesstoken def complete_acesstoken="bearer "+accesstoken log.info complete_acesstoken context.testCase.setPropertyValue("AcessToken",complete_acesstoken) assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["#status#"] == ["HTTP/1.1 200 OK"]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def accesstoken=holder.data.access_token log.info accesstoken def complete_acesstoken="bearer "+accesstoken log.info complete_acesstoken context.testCase.setPropertyValue("AccessToken",complete_acesstoken) assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["#status#"] == ["HTTP/1.1 200 OK"]

import groovy.json.JsonSlurper def response = messageExchange.response.responseContent def holder = new JsonSlurper().parseText(response) def accesstoken=holder.data.access_token log.info accesstoken def complete_acesstoken="bearer "+accesstoken log.info complete_acesstoken context.testCase.setPropertyValue("AccessToken",complete_acesstoken) assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["#status#"] == ["HTTP/1.1 200 OK"]

con:testStep.name: Get list of products by page and limit
